<line: 2> UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THE 
<line: 3> DISTRICT OF PUERTO RICO 

[TITLE]
<line: 5> UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,  
<line: 6> Plaintiff, 

[TEXT]
<line: 8> CASE NO.:17-CR-32 (FAB)(CVR) 

[TEXT]
<line: 10> v.  

[TEXT]
<line: 12> MARISOL SOTO-TORRES, 
<line: 13> Defendant. 

[TITLE]
<line: 15> INFORMATIVE MOTION  
<line: 16> (Re: Pretrial Diversion Program) 

[TEXT]
<line: 18> TO THE HONORABLE CAMILLE L. VELEZ-RIVE 
<line: 19> UNITED STATES MAGISTRATE JUDGE 
<line: 20> FOR THE DISTRICT OF PUERTO RICO: 

[TEXT]
<line: 22> COMES NOW, the Defendant, Marisol Soto-Torres, hereinafter “Ms. Soto,” by and 
<line: 23> through the undersigned Assistant Federal Defender, very respectfully states as follows: 

[TEXT]
<line: 25> 1. On January 24, 2017, Ms. Soto was charged in a one-count Information with violation 
<line: 26> of 18 U.S.C. § 113(a)(4).  Docket No. 1.  

[TEXT]
<line: 28> 2. The defense files this motion to inform that the parties have agreed to a Pretrial 
<line: 29> Diversion Program.  The Agreement provides that the offense shall be deferred for a 
<line: 30> period of 12 months, and that if Ms. Soto-Torres successfully complies with United 
<line: 31> States Probation Office (“USPO”) supervision during that time, the charges against her 
<line: 32> will be dismissed.  This agreement has been signed and executed by the parties, and 
<line: 33> accepted by the USPO.  

[TEXT]
<line: 35> 3. Ms. Soto-Torres requests that the Court accept the parties’ agreement and schedule a 
<line: 36> status conference 12 months from now, the presumptive conclusion of the Pretrial 
<line: 37> Diversion Program period.   

[ABANDON]
<line: 39> 1 

[TEXT]
<line: 2> WHEREFORE, it is respectfully requested that this Honorable Court take notice of this 
<line: 3> motion and that the same be granted.   

[TEXT]
<line: 5> I HEREBY CERTIFY that on this date I electronically filed the present motion with the 
<line: 6> Clerk of Court using the CM/ECF system which will send electronic notification of said filing to 
<line: 7> all parties of record. 

[TEXT]
<line: 9> RESPECTFULLY SUBMITTED, 

[TEXT]
<line: 11> In San Juan, Puerto Rico, this 26th day of July, 2017. 

[TITLE]
<line: 13> ERIC ALEXANDER VOS 
<line: 14> Chief Defender 
<line: 15> District of Puerto Rico 

[TEXT]
